author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
In the brief moments we see Aragorn serving as King, we get a great indication of his character and leadership.  In one of his first Kingly acts, we find Aragorn's great sense of justice, and also his capacity for mercy.

Hit subscribe and the bell for great Tolkien content every week!

title: Aragorn's Justice and Mercy | Tolkien Explained
